items.title: Drivers over 70 to face eye tests every three years
items.description: The move is part of the government's new road safety strategy, which plans to reform driving laws in Britain.

items.title: Tomorrowland to hold its first-ever Asia festival in Thailand
items.description: Founded 20 years ago, Tomorrowland has grown into one of the most iconic celebrations of electronic music.

items.title: Nvidia unveils self-driving car tech as it seeks to power more products with AI
items.description: The chip giant is looking for ways to move the AI revolution beyond software and into physical products.

items.title: Is AI taking the fun out of fantasy football?
items.description: Some fans of FPL and other leagues are turning to chatbots and apps to get a leg up over other players.

items.title: US action in Venezuela morally right, Badenoch says
items.description: The Conservative leader tells the BBC the military operation raises "serious questions about the rules-based order".
